metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4484 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.Description:
The Debian initrd script for the cryptsetup package 2:1.7.3-2 and earlierallows physically proximate attackers to gain shell access via many log inattempts with an invalid password.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4484` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cryptsetup - 2:2.3.3-1ubuntu4
cryptsetup-bin - 2:2.3.3-1ubuntu4
cryptsetup-initramfs - 2:2.3.3-1ubuntu4
cryptsetup-run - 2:2.3.3-1ubuntu4
cryptsetup-ssh - 2:2.3.3-1ubuntu4
cryptsetup-suspend - 2:2.3.3-1ubuntu4
libcryptsetup12 - 2:2.3.3-1ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cryptsetup package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:2.3.3-1ubuntu4').
